text: What if you put the topic cluster articles in a tag? Otherwise, I wouldn't know a solution.

I have some website questions. Where is the best place to ask those? Its a simple thing we are trying to display URL parameters on a HubSpot page.

<#C22PU4LV8|general> is great for random questions, otherwise I would ask in a channel related to the thing you are asking about. For example <#C2YH119N2|hubl> <#CFPRTEGTX|modules> <#CSFGKSHT7|themes> <#CLJJXGTC0|local-development> are common topics.

You’ll want to use `{{ request.query_dict }}`
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/variables#http-request-variables>

`{{ request.query_dict.your_specific_parameter_name }}`
